Name: Sensible Blood Rugby
About the game: An hommage to classic arcade games from the 90s , adapted to the olympic sport of rugby sevens ! Experience Tackles, Rucks, Illegal Tackles Make your way to the score lines and score many tries! -up to 4 concurrent players (need joysticks) -16 teams -International Competions The rules are the rugby seven rules, (i.e you can only pass backwards). The only difference is that in the game you can tackle players without ball :) For a better experience, it's recommended to play with joysticks.
